content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a cause involving multiple parties it explains that there are various real estate properties and assets that have been inherited through succession including apartments garages offices and a share in a building the text also mentions the compliance with building regulations and necessary permits for modifications the parties involved mr ccarlo and ms ccarla have agreed to terminate their joint ownership and divide the assets into two shares the assigned properties are listed along with their cadastral income the text also includes provisions regarding the guarantee of ownership the effective date of the agreement and the equal sharing of expenses the document is signed by the parties and the notary
